Class SeatService

java.lang.Object
com.javaoop.movie_booking_app.service.SeatService
@Service public class SeatService extends Object
Service class for managing seat-related operations such as retrieval and conflict checking.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SeatService(SeatRepository seatRepository)
    Constructs a SeatService with the provided SeatRepository.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    countConflictSeats(Long showtimeId, List<Long> seatIds)
    Counts how many seats in the given list are already booked for the specified showtime.
    List<Seat>
    getAllSeatInHall(Hall hall)
    Retrieves all seats in a given hall, ordered by row (ascending) and seat number (ascending).
    Optional<Seat>
    getSeatById(Long id)
    Retrieves a seat by its unique ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • SeatService

      @Autowired public SeatService(SeatRepository seatRepository)
      Constructs a SeatService with the provided SeatRepository.
      Parameters:
      seatRepository - repository for accessing seat data

  • Method Details

    • getSeatById

      public Optional<Seat> getSeatById(Long id)
      Retrieves a seat by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the seat
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the Seat if found, otherwise empty

    • getAllSeatInHall

      public List<Seat> getAllSeatInHall(Hall hall)
      Retrieves all seats in a given hall, ordered by row (ascending) and seat number (ascending).
      Parameters:
      hall - the Hall entity to retrieve seats for
      Returns:
      a list of Seat entities ordered by row and number

    • countConflictSeats

      public long countConflictSeats(Long showtimeId, List<Long> seatIds)
      Counts how many seats in the given list are already booked for the specified showtime.
      Parameters:
      showtimeId - the ID of the showtime to check against
      seatIds - a list of seat IDs to check for conflicts
      Returns:
      the number of seats that are already booked (conflicting)
